title: E-Ticket SMOCP
subtitle: E-Ticket System
description: Comprehensive electronic ticketing system for events with QR code check-in functionality, real-time analytics dashboard, and seamless ticket management. Features include automated email notifications, attendee tracking, and detailed reporting.

title: Clubs Check-in System
subtitle: Club Management
description: Smart attendance tracking system for university club activities with gamified leaderboard features, peer check-in verification, and location-based validation to ensure accurate attendance records.

title: BlindHelp UI
subtitle: Accessibility App
description: Innovative mobile application specifically designed for visually impaired users featuring comprehensive voice navigation, screen reader optimization, and intuitive accessibility controls to enhance digital independence.

title: QR Payment System
subtitle: Payment System
description: Secure and efficient QR code-based payment solution designed for seamless financial transactions with real-time processing, comprehensive security measures, and detailed transaction analytics.
